content.rendered:
Directed by Sanjay Sharma

Written by Raghu Niduvalli. Sanjay Sharma. H.R. Tejovrusha

Cast Anant Nag (Thimayya Sr.). Diganth (Thimayya Jr.). Vineeth Kumar (Andy). Prakash Thuminad (Jaganna). Shubra Aaiyappa (Sowmya Machchiah). Ambujakshi (Mrs. Shenoy). Sunil Bt (Krish). Chaitra Rao Ginirama (Boji). Mimicry Gopi (Manje Gwoda). Muruli n (Guru Dutt Shenoy). Aindrita Ray (Jo). K.S. Sridhar (Arjun Machaiah). Venkatesh Sriram (Chikkups).Mugu Suresh. Rukmini Vijayakumar (Namita Shenoy)

Language Kannada

Producers Rajesh Sharma.

Production Garuda Motion Pictures
